explains: adj. 有过失的；怠忽的；拖欠债务的
n. 流氓；行为不良的人；失职者

sentences.en: Someone would need to pay the $180,000 delinquent tax note at auction.
sentences.cn: 有人需要在拍卖中支付18万美元的拖欠税款。

sentences.en: There are now 3.5 million mortgages at least 90 days delinquent.
sentences.cn: 现在有350万的房贷拖欠时间延长至90天。

sentences.en: Lenders of all stripes clearly prefer to foreclose on delinquent borrowers.
sentences.cn: 对于逾期不还贷的借款人，形形色色的放款人明显青睐没收他们的房产。
